title: help with a typographical logotype
content:
Hello,

Please help me find a font that look similar to what  
I've been drawing for the last 3 weeks.

This is the feel that I'm looking for, but  
I cant get it there.

Does anybody know something similar.

By the way, I started drawing this logo with the  
font ''Reckon''

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [eloize.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201553/http:/typophile.com/files/eloize.jpg) | 44.42 KB |
author: ericquenneville

comments.content: Reminds me, a bit, of [Tema Cantante](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201553/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/tema-cantante/regular/) from T26.
You could also go through the work of [Jos Buivenga](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201553/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/index.html).

I would be pleased if my fonts could be of any help ...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201553im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eloize_4515.gif)
  
Top: [Fertigo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201553/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/fertigo.html) / Bottom: [Diavlo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201553/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/diavlo.html)

wow, thanks guys...

This mean a lot to me.

These are all fonts that I never knew about.

thank you.
